concept.title: 5153.303-11 Format for Determination and Findings for other than full and open competition. (DPCAP Class Deviation 2024-O0005—Temporary Authorizations for Covered Contracts Related to Ukraine, Taiwan, and Israel).

conbody.p: See D&F Template located in the Army Templates and Guides on PAM to document a public interest determination under 10 USC 3204(a)(7) and FAR 6.302-7 in support of the award of a “covered contract.” See DPCAP Class Deviation 2024-O0005– Temporary Authorizations for Covered Contracts Related to Ukraine, Taiwan, and Israel.
